title: Why i can't post or comment on board?
body: It say i can't post or comment on board because i don't reach level 7 requirement, but i'm currently level 24... can i have any help?

replies.body: The same thing with me. Board LVL 5, in game LVL 30. So im posting this in hopes it solves the issue.

An account usually needs to sync to the boards when posting for the first time, and usually a post or upvote can do just that.  Everything looks okay now!  Let me know if you still have any issues posting.
